basicQuest.title: Spot an Ant
basicQuest.instructions: In a world rushing by, take a moment to notice something small. Ants are natureâ€™s tireless builders â€” a reminder that even the tiniest effort matters. Get low, stay still, and observe a little life in action.

AiSnap.taskDescription: an ant crawling on the ground
